snippet: Randy Brogdon, chairman of the Oklahoma Republican Party, apologized Tuesday for a post on the party’s Facebook page that said that giving people food stamps was akin to feeding animals in national parks.
abstract: Oklahoma Republican Party chairman Randy Brogdon apologizes for post on party's Facebook page that likened food stamp recipients to animals in public parks.
lead_paragraph: Randy Brogdon, chairman of the Oklahoma Republican Party, apologized Tuesday for a post on the party’s Facebook page that said that giving people food stamps was akin to feeding animals in national parks.

headline.main: Oklahoma: G.O.P. Leader Apologizes for Insult to Food Stamp Recipients
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: G.O.P. Leader Apologizes for Insult to Food Stamp Recipients
